definitions.definition: methods of sending information, especially phones, radio, computers, etc. or roads and railways

**wireless/electronic/satellite communication**

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from Old French comunicacion, from Latin communicatio(n-), from the verb communicare ‘to share’, from communis ‘common’.
